name: Add a new user to a list in Iterable from a new lead in Facebook Lead Ads
description:
Every time a new lead is generated in Facebook Leads Ads, a new user will be instantly added to a list in Iterable.

The template expects your Facebook form to at least collect these fields:
1) Email
2) Full Name

The template also expects your Iterable list to have these fields: 
1) email
2) name
